asset.name: TransCon CNP
asset.mechanism: CNP therapy that releases the FGFR3-induced brake, enabling complementary effect of growth hormone

investment_thesis: Combination therapy exceeds historical benchmarks for growth with tripling of efficacy compared to TransCon CNP monotherapy
Well-positioned to be the leader in growth disorders with once-weekly TransCon CNP and TransCon hGH
Complementary mechanisms: TransCon CNP releases the brake enabling GH to accelerate outcomes
